name: chrome-copy-html
author: Justin Mahar <contact@justinmahar.com>
description: ðŸ“ƒ Chrome extension to easily copy a page's HTML to the clipboard.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./src/_js && tsc && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/build && cp manifest.json dist/build && cp -R images dist/build && mkdir dist/build/src && cp -R src ./dist/build && zip -r dist/build.zip dist/build/*
